item.title: By: Ritz
item.dc:creator: Ritz
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/buy-or-sell-what-the-hell-2/#comment-377">Mike</a>.
Thanks We are working on a regular schedule. Let us know if there something specific you might want covered. We will see if we can fit it in a futures episode.
Jenkins Risk Management
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Mike.

Thanks
We are working on a regular schedule. Let us know if there something specific you might want covered. We will see if we can fit it in a futures episode.

Jenkins Risk Management

item.title: By: Will
item.dc:creator: Will
item.description: Good show. Would appreciate more elaborate show notes plus links.
item.content:encoded: Good show. Would appreciate more elaborate show notes plus links.

item.title: By: Mike
item.dc:creator: Mike
item.description: Great episode, enjoyed it! Keep it coming. Thanks for sharing your knowledge guys!
item.content:encoded: Great episode, enjoyed it! Keep it coming. Thanks for sharing your knowledge guys!
